title: 4 thoughts going into Semifinals
body: This week was a total eclipse of the heart... for C9 and NV fans. The Semifinals features old guards in Counter Logic Gaming and TSM taking on two teams that haven't made it to an NA LCS Final yet in Immortals and Team Dignitas. Who will advance?

replies.body: Rooting for TSM to take it all, just so C9 won't see them in the regional qualifier :)
Win or lose... TSM has already qualified for Worlds and will not be in the gauntlet. So no fear there.

Going by history, paper, and overall performance it looks like TSM and IMT will be in the finals and DIG and CLG will.be fighting for 3rd place.

If my prediction is true then TSM and IMT will.be our #1 & #2 teams at Worlds and everyone else (C9, DIG, FA, and CLG) will have to fight it out in the gauntlet.
Those eclipse puns had me cringing at my desk.{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
I decided to put my butt-cheeks against my window when the eclipse happened. According to some people, there were two moons seen that day.
Flyquest: Not even a total eclipse can stop Moon
Not even a total eclipse can stop suntorin..... ;(
When you give CLG too much credit, apparently
why did every team have a bad eclipse pun
We all know TSM will take the W once again
I'm ready for the god huhi pocket pick mr game and watch PogChamp
I don't know if I'm amazed or mad that you managed to make a pun for all four teams.
Wait, I can't find "Baron Nashor" on team Dig's lineup. Someone help!!!!!{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

"Their Player To Watch This Week Is Baron Nashor "  Nice!!! I was laughing pretty hard there. TSM for sure, Im sure they are taking playoffs very seriously given their performance at worlds last year.
